techmeme.title: FTC v. Meta: Mark Zuckerberg says he considers TikTok the "highest competitive threat" for Facebook and Instagram in the past few years (Julia Shapero/The Hill)
The US House opens a probe on whether Nvidia knowingly provided AI tech to DeepSeek in violation of US rules and asks Nvidia for details on its Asian customers (New York Times)
Tech stocks plunge amid uncertainty over US tariff plans and China export controls: AMD, Nvidia, and ASML dropped 7%, Applied Materials and Lam Research fell 5% (Samantha Subin/CNBC)
Former CISA Director Chris Krebs says he is resigning from SentinelOne to more freely challenge the White House, after Trump directed the DOJ to investigate him (Wall Street Journal)
US Secretary of State Marco Rubio confirms the elimination of R/FIMI, an office aimed at tracking and countering foreign disinformation campaigns (Eileen Guo/MIT Technology Review)
